subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jose Reyes and Jeff Francoeur hit home runs, and Hisanori Takahashi pitched seven strong innings to give the Mets consecutive road victories for the first time in 11 months.
snippet: Jose Reyes and Jeff Francoeur hit home runs, and Hisanori Takahashi pitched seven strong innings to give the Mets consecutive road victories for the first time in 11 months.
